Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'That concludes the announcement.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "If there are no questions, you're all dismissed. Just don't forget to turn in your reports on time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the meeting wraps up, the fluorescent lights flicker on. Everyone around the long table gathers their files, stands, and begins to head out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Oh, 【kuroname】, I need you to stay for a moment.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a mysterious smile, Celica waves you over.'}
{2: '(Walk over, already used to this routine)', 3: '12', 4: 'This is about "that mission again," isn\'t it?', 5: '12'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Bingo! You guessed it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pulls a finely crafted mechanical magpie from a cardboard box beneath the table.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Can you guess what the World Folklore Enthusiasts has cooked up this year?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "They've teamed up with the mechanoids to host a huge Double Seventh Festival souvenir exhibition!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right then, the mechanical magpie in her hand seems to react to a keyword, flapping its wings and croaking out in a raspy voice.'}
{2: 'Mechanical Magpie', 3: 'Caw caw! Constellia! Double Seventh Festival Souvenir Exhibition! Grand! Spectacular! Guaranteed to make you feel right at home! Caw caw!'}
{2: 'Pretty sure parrots are supposed to be the ones that talk, not magpies.', 3: '25', 4: "So, I'm heading to Constellia again?", 5: '25'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "Mm-hmm. I hear this year's venue is bigger than ever, with more challenges and events to try.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'The stalls are offering not only materials the mechanoids have collected, but also all kinds of handmade souvenirs as prizes...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "As usual, while you're there, just bring back a few items for the WGAA to use as references.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'No need to stress about it. Just think of this as a chance to take a break and enjoy yourself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica seems quite fond of the magpie, gently rubbing its head as she talks.'}
{2: 'So, where did this magpie come from?', 3: '33'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Oh, right, I forgot to introduce it. This is Little Caw. It's one of the mechanoid organizers for the event.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "If you've got any questions, ask it on the way. It'll fill you in.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You take Little Caw from her. It's still flapping nonstop, and the weight hits you immediately—it's heavier than it looks."}
{2: 'Little Caw', 3: "Caw caw! Don't worry, 【kuroname】! Once we reach Constellia, you're going to have a wonderful Double Seventh Festival!"}
{2: "I'm counting on you.", 3: '42', 4: "Let's get moving.", 5: '42'}
{2: 'Little Caw', 3: "Alright, let's go, caw!"}
